definition: hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
hand in hand and shoulder to shoulder
to walk hand in hand/to cooperate

sentences.english: You never work, but spend a year on year.
sentences.chinese: 你们从未携手，却共度了年年月月。

sentences.english: In the South, Methodists and Baptists joined hands in the movement.
sentences.chinese: 教徒和浸礼教徒在运动中携手合作。

sentences.english: Gunars Valkirs and N. Leigh Anderson collaborate on protein array research.
sentences.chinese: 瓦克斯及安德森在蛋白质晶片的研究上，携手合作。

sentences.english: Refactoring goes hand in hand with automated testing.
sentences.chinese: 重构与自动化测试是携手并进的。

sentences.english: Then we hand in hand together, with our solidarity of hands.
sentences.chinese: 那么我们携手同心，用我们同舟共济的双手。

sentences.english: A warm welcome society all sections of the people joins hands , shows great plans together.
sentences.chinese: 热情欢迎社会各界人士携手合作，共展宏图。

sentences.english: In the light of together with happiness, just more precious.
sentences.chinese: 平平淡淡之中的携手与幸福，才更珍贵。

sentences.english: Why not work together to solve this problem?
sentences.chinese: 那为什么不一起携手解决这问题呢？

sentences.english: People in love , go forward , hand in hand.
They agreed to enhance solidarity, deepen cooperation and join hands to meet challenges.
sentences.chinese: 各国应加强团结，深化合作，携手应对挑战。

sentences.english: Wang and the old andnew customers to join hands in creating brilliant.
sentences.chinese: 望与新老客户携手共创辉煌。

sentences.english: So, I think that is one area where we can all work together.
sentences.chinese: 因此我认为，在这个领域，我们是能够携手合作的。

sentences.english: We fly together, leapt to the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 我们携手展翅高飞，跃上云端。

sentences.english: They would act hand in hand.
Section Shing who is willing to work together with you to create a better tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 科盛人愿与您携手共进，创造美好的明天。

sentences.english: Join Juyi decoration company, you will have a wonderfull life.
sentences.chinese: 携手聚艺装饰公司，您会拥有更美好的生活。

definition: to walk hand in hand/to cooperate
lit. to join hands/to act together
hand in hand and shoulder to shoulder
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
to cooperate/to collaborate/to work together/cooperation/CL:個|个[ge4]
lit. in the same boat under wind and rain (idiom); fig. to stick together in hard times
(honorific) your kind efforts/thanks to your help
to fulfill one's dream/(divination) to predict the future by interpreting a dream/oneiromancy
